works.description:
I wrote a Remote Car Starter Buying Guide on our site back in September of 2008. 

http://www.mobileedgeonline.com/wp-content/2008/09/remote-car-starter-buying-guide

It is purely my original content.  The infringing content is very similar in nature to my post.  At first it was a near exact "cut and paste" changing only the names of the stores.  I contacted the owner and he said he would change it.  They made some changes, but I feel that their content is still tightly based on my content and is plagiarism.    It is simply a rework of my content and you can easily see that much of the content is identical.
